ground_truth: He walks into Aisha's apartment and looks around, his face aglow with sweat. He goes into the living room. The TV is on. He tests the temperature of a pot of tea. Holding his gun, Ferris walks along the hall and goes into the kitchen. He sees a streak of blood on the side of a worktop and touches it. Ferris rubs the dark, sticky substance between his fingers. He walks out onto the balcony and makes a phone call. Marwan sits alone in a restaurant. Ferris walks up and two bodyguards stop him. Marwan goes to Hani. Hani leaves his attractive female companion and walks off with Ferris. They stand facing each other. Edgy, Ferris steps right up to Hani. Hani walks off. Marwan stops Ferris' firing. At an airport, a hangar door opens. Holding Aisha's phone, Ferris runs over to a small jet. Hoffman gets off with a bag slung on his shoulder. A message appears on the phone. There's a long phone number. Ferris makes the call. Ferris is dropped off in a village. A van rolls up. The driver gets out and opens the back. Ferris climbs in beneath the back seats and lies in the storage area. The driver, with thick stubble and cap, puts on a tape as he drives off. A bright golden sun shines across the desert. The van follows a line of cars and slows up. A soldier stands with an Alsatian. Another sits in the turret of a tank. A soldier waves the van over. The driver glances behind him. The soldier checks the driver's papers. Dar'a, Syria. The van drives through the desert, passing nomads with two camels. A golden sun hangs above mountains in the distance. The van travels across the barren and scorched land leaving a trail of dust. Viewed from the surveillance camera, the van is a dot on an expanse of light brown earth. The van stops. The driver opens the back. Sunlight floods in. Ferris hauls himself out. The driver beckons to him. The driver gets in the van and leaves. Ferris paces. Flat, golden, dusty earth dotted with small bushes stretches for miles. Clutching Aisha's phone, Ferris squats down and looks up into the clear blue sky. He runs his hand across his sweaty face. Hoffman is in the surveillance room, viewing Ferris from above. Ferris wanders across the dirt. Four SUVs appear and drive towards him. He stares at them. Ferris looks at the sky and puts his hands up. The team watch the surveillance screen. The SUVs drive in a circle around Ferris churning up a dust cloud, obscuring them. Men get out of the SUVs and go up to Ferris.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He strolls into Aisha's flat and glances around, his visage radiant with perspiration. He proceeds into the sitting area. The television is on. He tests the warmth of a kettle of brew. Clasping his firearm, Ferris strides along the corridor and proceeds into the culinary area. He notices a streak of gore on the side of a countertop and touches it. Ferris rubs the dark, adhesive matter between his digits. He strides out onto the veranda and makes a phone call. Marwan sits solo in a diner. Ferris saunters up and two guards halt him. Marwan approaches Hani. Hani departs his attractive female associate and walks off with Ferris. They stand facing each other. Uneasy, Ferris steps right up to Hani. Hani strides away. Marwan halts Ferris' discharge. At an airstrip, a hangar door opens. Holding Aisha's phone, Ferris runs over to a small aircraft. Hoffman disembarks with a satchel slung on his shoulder. A message appears on the device. There's a lengthy phone number. Ferris makes the call. Ferris is dropped off in a hamlet. A van rolls up. The operator gets out and opens the back. Ferris climbs in beneath the rear seats and lies in the storage compartment. The operator, with thick stubble and cap, puts on a cassette as he drives off. A bright golden sun beams across the wasteland. The van follows a queue of vehicles and decelerates. A trooper stands with an Alsatian. Another perches in the turret of a tank. A trooper waves the van over. The operator glances behind him. The trooper verifies the operator's documents. Dar'a, Syria. The van traverses through the wasteland, passing wanderers with two camels. A golden sun hangs above elevations in the distance. The van travels across the desolate and scorched terrain leaving a trail of dust. Viewed from the surveillance camera, the van is a speck on a vastness of light brown soil. The van halts. The operator opens the back. Sunlight inundates in. Ferris pulls himself out. The operator signals to him. The operator gets in the van and departs. Ferris paces. Flat, golden, dusty terrain dotted with small shrubs stretches for miles. Clutching Aisha's device, Ferris crouches down and gazes up into the clear azure sky. He runs his hand across his sweaty visage. Hoffman is in the surveillance chamber, observing Ferris from above. Ferris rambles across the dirt. Four SUVs appear and proceed towards him. He gazes at them. Ferris looks at the sky and raises his hands. The team observes the surveillance display. The SUVs drive in a circle around Ferris, churning up a dust cloud, obscuring them. Men exit the SUVs and approach Ferris.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He enters Aisha's apartment, his face sweaty, and heads to the living room where the TV is on. He checks a pot of tea's temperature. Holding his gun, Ferris walks to the kitchen, notices a blood streak on a worktop, and touches it. He rubs the sticky substance between his fingers, then steps onto the balcony to make a call. Marwan sits alone in a restaurant. Ferris approaches but is stopped by two bodyguards. Marwan goes to Hani, who leaves his female companion to join Ferris. They face each other, and Ferris, edgy, steps up to Hani, who then walks off. Marwan prevents Ferris from firing. At an airport, a hangar door opens. Ferris, holding Aisha's phone, runs to a small jet. Hoffman disembarks with a bag. A message with a long number appears on the phone, and Ferris calls it. Ferris is dropped in a village, where a van arrives. The driver opens the back, and Ferris climbs in, lying in the storage area. The driver, with stubble and a cap, plays a tape as he drives. A bright sun shines over the desert. The van follows cars and slows. A soldier with an Alsatian and another in a tank turret are present. A soldier waves the van over and checks the driver's papers. In Dar'a, Syria, the van passes nomads with camels under a golden sun. It travels across barren land, leaving a dust trail. From a surveillance camera, the van is a dot on light brown earth. It stops, and the driver opens the back, letting sunlight in. Ferris climbs out, and the driver beckons before leaving. Ferris paces on flat, dusty earth with small bushes. Holding Aisha's phone, he squats and looks at the sky, wiping his sweaty face. Hoffman watches Ferris from a surveillance room. Ferris wanders the dirt as four SUVs approach. He stares at them, looks skyward, and raises his hands. The team watches the surveillance screen as the SUVs circle Ferris, creating a dust cloud. Men exit the SUVs and approach Ferris.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He enters Aisha's apartment, sweating, and heads to the living room where the TV is on. Ferris tests a pot of tea's temperature, then, holding his gun, goes to the kitchen, finds blood on a worktop, and touches it. On the balcony, he makes a call. Marwan is in a restaurant. Ferris approaches but is stopped by bodyguards. Marwan goes to Hani, who leaves his companion to meet Ferris. They face each other, Ferris edgy. Hani leaves, and Marwan stops Ferris from firing. At an airport, Ferris runs to a jet with Aisha's phone. Hoffman exits with a bag. A message with a long number appears on the phone, and Ferris calls. In a village, Ferris is dropped off, climbs into a van's storage area, and the driver, with stubble and cap, plays a tape. The van follows cars, slows, and a soldier with an Alsatian checks papers. In Dar'a, Syria, the van passes nomads and travels through the desert, leaving a dust trail. From a surveillance camera, the van is a dot on the earth. It stops, and Ferris exits. The driver leaves, and Ferris paces the dusty land, clutching Aisha's phone. Hoffman watches from the surveillance room. Ferris wanders, and four SUVs approach, circling him and creating a dust cloud. Men exit the SUVs and approach Ferris.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
He steps into Aisha's apartment, taking a moment to glance around, his face glistening with a sheen of sweat. He proceeds into the living room, where the television is already on, filling the room with a low hum. He carefully tests the temperature of a pot of tea, feeling the warmth radiate from it. With his gun in hand, Ferris makes his way down the hall and enters the kitchen. There, he notices a streak of blood on the side of a worktop and reaches out to touch it. Ferris rubs the dark, sticky substance between his fingers, contemplating its significance. He then walks out onto the balcony, where he makes a phone call.

Meanwhile, Marwan is seated alone in a restaurant. As Ferris approaches, two bodyguards intercept him, preventing him from advancing further. Marwan then moves towards Hani. Hani, leaving behind his attractive female companion, walks off with Ferris. They stand facing each other, tension palpable in the air. Feeling edgy, Ferris steps right up to Hani, who then walks away. Marwan intervenes to stop Ferris from firing his weapon.

At an airport, a hangar door slowly opens. Clutching Aisha's phone, Ferris runs over to a small jet. Hoffman disembarks, a bag slung casually over his shoulder. A message appears on the phone, displaying a long phone number. Ferris promptly makes the call. He is then dropped off in a village, where a van rolls up to meet him. The driver exits the vehicle and opens the back, allowing Ferris to climb in beneath the back seats and lie in the storage area. The driver, sporting thick stubble and a cap, puts on a tape as he drives away.

A bright, golden sun casts its light across the vast desert. The van follows a line of cars and gradually slows down. A soldier stands with an Alsatian dog, while another sits in the turret of a tank. A soldier waves the van over, prompting the driver to glance behind him. The soldier checks the driver's papers, confirming their location as Dar'a, Syria. The van continues its journey through the desert, passing nomads accompanied by two camels. A golden sun hangs majestically above distant mountains. The van travels across the barren, scorched land, leaving a trail of dust in its wake. From the perspective of a surveillance camera, the van appears as a mere dot on the vast expanse of light brown earth.

Eventually, the van comes to a stop. The driver opens the back, allowing sunlight to flood in. Ferris hauls himself out of the van, and the driver beckons to him before getting back into the van and driving away. Ferris paces on the flat, golden, dusty earth, which is dotted with small bushes stretching for miles. Clutching Aisha's phone, Ferris squats down and gazes up into the clear blue sky, running his hand across his sweaty face. Meanwhile, Hoffman is in the surveillance room, observing Ferris from above. Ferris wanders across the dirt, and soon, four SUVs appear, driving towards him. He stares at them intently. Ferris looks up at the sky and raises his hands. The team watches the surveillance screen as the SUVs drive in a circle around Ferris, churning up a dust cloud that obscures them. Men exit the SUVs and approach Ferris.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
He steps cautiously into Aisha's apartment, taking a brief moment to glance around, his face glistening with a sheen of sweat that betrays his hurried journey. He then moves into the comfortable living room, where the television is already on, its quiet murmur filling the space with a low, almost comforting hum. He carefully tests the temperature of a pot of tea, feeling the inviting warmth radiating from its surface. With his gun firmly in hand, Ferris makes his way down the narrow hall and enters the compact kitchen. There, he notices a disturbing streak of blood on the side of a worktop and instinctively reaches out to touch it. Ferris rubs the dark, sticky substance between his fingers, contemplating its ominous significance. He then strides out onto the small balcony, where he makes an important phone call. 

Meanwhile, Marwan finds himself seated alone in a dimly lit restaurant. As Ferris approaches, two vigilant bodyguards intercept him, preventing him from advancing any further. Marwan then shifts his attention and moves towards Hani. Hani, leaving behind his attractive female companion, decisively walks off with Ferris. The two stand facing each other, with tension almost palpable in the thickened air. Feeling edgy and uncertain, Ferris steps right up to Hani, who then simply walks away. Marwan swiftly intervenes to stop Ferris from impulsively firing his weapon. 

At the airport, a massive hangar door methodically opens. Clutching Aisha's phone tightly, Ferris sprints over to a waiting small jet. Hoffman casually disembarks, a bag slung nonchalantly over his shoulder. A message suddenly appears on the phone, displaying a long, unfamiliar phone number. Ferris promptly makes the call. He is then dropped off in a remote village, where a van soon rolls up to meet him. The driver exits the vehicle and opens the back, allowing Ferris to climb in beneath the back seats and lie quietly in the storage area. The driver, sporting thick stubble and a worn cap, puts on a tape as he smoothly drives away. 

A bright, golden sun casts a warm and radiant light across the expansive desert landscape. The van follows a line of cars and begins to gradually slow down. A soldier stands alert with an Alsatian dog, while another sits poised in the turret of a tank. A soldier gestures for the van to pull over, prompting the cautious driver to glance behind him. The soldier meticulously checks the driver's papers, confirming their location as Dar'a, Syria. The van regains speed and continues its journey through the desolate desert, passing nomads accompanied by two languid camels. A golden sun majestically hangs above the distant, rugged mountains. The van travels across the barren, scorched earth, leaving a trailing cloud of dust in its wake. From the perspective of a distant surveillance camera, the van appears as a mere dot on the vast, light-brown expanse of the earth. 

Eventually, the van comes to a complete stop. The driver opens the back, allowing the harsh sunlight to flood in. Ferris hauls himself out of the van, and the driver beckons to him before getting back into the van and driving away into the distance. Ferris paces on the flat, golden, dusty earth, which is sparsely dotted with small, hardy bushes stretching for miles. Clutching Aisha's phone, Ferris squats down and gazes up into the expansive, clear blue sky, running his hand across his sweat-drenched face. Meanwhile, Hoffman is in the surveillance room, keenly observing Ferris from above. Ferris wanders across the coarse dirt, and soon, four SUVs come into view, driving towards him with purpose. He stares at them intently and unwaveringly. Ferris looks up at the vast sky and raises his hands in surrender. The team watches the surveillance screen as the SUVs drive in a circle around Ferris, churning up a dense dust cloud that momentarily obscures them from view. Men exit the SUVs and purposefully approach Ferris.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He steps into Aisha's apartment, his face glistening with sweat, and takes a moment to survey his surroundings. Moving with purpose, he heads into the living room where the TV is already on, casting a soft glow across the room. He approaches a pot of tea, carefully testing its temperature with a gentle touch. With his gun in hand, Ferris proceeds down the hallway, his footsteps echoing softly, and enters the kitchen. There, his eyes catch a streak of blood on the side of a worktop, and he reaches out to touch it, feeling the dark, sticky substance between his fingers. He then makes his way out onto the balcony, where he pauses to make a phone call. Meanwhile, Marwan sits alone in a restaurant, and as Ferris approaches, two bodyguards intercept him, halting his progress. Marwan then moves towards Hani, who leaves his attractive female companion behind to walk off with Ferris. They stand facing each other, and Ferris, feeling edgy, steps right up to Hani, who eventually walks away. Marwan intervenes to stop Ferris from firing. At an airport, a hangar door slowly opens, and Ferris, clutching Aisha's phone, runs over to a small jet. Hoffman disembarks with a bag slung over his shoulder. A message appears on the phone, displaying a long phone number, which Ferris promptly dials. Ferris is then dropped off in a village, where a van rolls up to him. The driver exits, opens the back, and Ferris climbs in, settling beneath the back seats in the storage area. The driver, sporting thick stubble and a cap, starts the van and puts on a tape as they drive off. The bright golden sun casts its light across the desert as the van follows a line of cars, eventually slowing down. A soldier stands with an Alsatian, while another sits in the turret of a tank. A soldier waves the van over, prompting the driver to glance behind him. The soldier checks the driver's papers, confirming their location as Dar'a, Syria. The van continues its journey through the desert, passing nomads with two camels, with a golden sun hanging above distant mountains. The van traverses the barren, scorched land, leaving a trail of dust in its wake. From a surveillance camera's perspective, the van appears as a dot on the vast expanse of light brown earth. The van comes to a stop, and the driver opens the back, allowing sunlight to flood in. Ferris hauls himself out, and the driver gestures for him to follow. The driver then gets back into the van and drives away, leaving Ferris pacing on the flat, golden, dusty earth that stretches for miles, dotted with small bushes. Clutching Aisha's phone, Ferris squats down and gazes up into the clear blue sky, running his hand across his sweaty face. Meanwhile, Hoffman observes from the surveillance room, watching Ferris from above. Ferris wanders across the dirt, and soon, four SUVs appear, driving towards him. He stares at them, then looks up at the sky and raises his hands. The team watches the surveillance screen as the SUVs drive in a circle around Ferris, churning up a dust cloud that obscures them. Men exit the SUVs and approach Ferris.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
Ferris enters Aisha's apartment, his face glistening with sweat, and moves through the living room where the TV is on. He checks the temperature of a pot of tea before proceeding to the kitchen, where he notices and examines a streak of blood on the worktop. After rubbing the dark, sticky substance between his fingers, he steps onto the balcony to make a phone call. Meanwhile, Marwan sits alone in a restaurant, and when Ferris approaches, two bodyguards intercept him. Marwan then goes to Hani, who leaves his female companion to converse with Ferris. They stand face-to-face, and after a tense exchange, Hani departs as Marwan prevents Ferris from firing.

At an airport, Ferris, holding Aisha's phone, rushes to a small jet as Hoffman disembarks with a bag. A message with a long phone number appears on the phone, prompting Ferris to make a call. He is then dropped off in a village where a van arrives. The driver, sporting thick stubble and a cap, lets Ferris climb into the storage area beneath the back seats before driving off into the desert. The van, part of a convoy, slows at a checkpoint where a soldier inspects the driver's papers. As they continue through Dar'a, Syria, the van traverses the desert, passing nomads and camels under a golden sun.

The van eventually stops, and Ferris emerges into the sunlight. After the driver departs, Ferris paces the vast, dusty landscape, clutching Aisha's phone and wiping sweat from his face. Meanwhile, Hoffman monitors him from a surveillance room. Ferris wanders the barren terrain until four SUVs approach, encircling him and kicking up a dust cloud. As Ferris raises his hands and looks skyward, men exit the SUVs and converge on him, all under the watchful eyes of the surveillance team.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He walks into Aisha's apartment, a modern two-bedroom flat located in a bustling part of the city with vibrant street life, and looks around, his face aglow with sweat from the sweltering heat outside. He goes into the living room, noticing the plush furniture that hints at recent success in her career. The TV is on, displaying a news channel discussing current geopolitical tensions. He tests the temperature of a pot of tea, which is a fragrant blend Aisha always keeps ready for guests. Holding his gun, Ferris, a seasoned intelligence operative, walks along the dimly lit hall and goes into the kitchen. He sees a streak of blood on the side of a worktop and touches it, recognizing it as a sign of a recent altercation. Ferris rubs the dark, sticky substance between his fingers, a technique he learned during his training in forensic analysis. He walks out onto the balcony, overlooking a courtyard filled with potted plants, and makes a phone call using an encrypted line. Marwan, known for his connections to underground networks, sits alone in a restaurant known for its exotic dishes and discreet atmosphere. Ferris walks up and two bodyguards, trained in close protection services, stop him. Marwan goes to Hani, a well-connected businessman with a reputation for being involved in covert operations. Hani leaves his attractive female companion, who is a well-known socialite in the community, and walks off with Ferris. They stand facing each other, surrounded by the muted hum of the restaurant. Edgy, Ferris steps right up to Hani, feeling the weight of their shared history. Hani walks off, his steps purposeful, signaling a conclusion to their tense exchange. Marwan stops Ferris' firing, a critical intervention that prevents a potentially explosive confrontation. At an airport, a hangar door opens beneath the watchful eyes of security personnel. Holding Aisha's phone, Ferris runs over to a small jet, a private aircraft known for its speed and agility in evasive maneuvers. Hoffman, a high-ranking intelligence officer who often operates on international missions, gets off with a bag slung on his shoulder, containing sensitive equipment. A message appears on the phone. There's a long phone number, an encrypted code needed to contact a covert operative. Ferris makes the call, a crucial step in his mission. Ferris is dropped off in a village on the outskirts of Dar'a, Syria, an area known for its strategic importance in regional conflicts. A van rolls up, its exterior dusty from long travel. The driver gets out and opens the back, revealing a hidden compartment. Ferris climbs in beneath the back seats and lies in the storage area, a strategy to avoid detection. The driver, with thick stubble and cap, puts on a tape of traditional local music as he drives off. A bright golden sun shines across the desert, casting long shadows on the arid landscape. The van follows a line of cars and slows up as they approach a checkpoint. A soldier stands with an Alsatian, trained for detecting contraband, while another sits in the turret of a tank, scanning the horizon for threats. A soldier waves the van over, signaling for a routine inspection. The driver glances behind him, maintaining a calm demeanor. The soldier checks the driver's papers, verifying his identity and travel permit. Dar'a, Syria, a flashpoint in recent conflicts, comes into full view as the van drives through the desert, passing nomads with two camels, their silhouettes stark against the horizon. A golden sun hangs above mountains in the distance, painting the sky in hues of orange and red. The van travels across the barren and scorched land leaving a trail of dust, marking its passage. Viewed from the surveillance camera operated by intelligence agencies monitoring the area, the van is a dot on an expanse of light brown earth, moving steadily. The van stops on a small rise with a panoramic view of the surrounding landscape. The driver opens the back, allowing sunlight to flood in. Ferris hauls himself out, stretching after the cramped ride. The driver beckons to him before getting back in the van and leaves, his mission completed. Ferris paces, surveying the flat, golden, dusty earth dotted with small bushes that stretches for miles, pondering his next move. Clutching Aisha's phone, Ferris squats down and looks up into the clear blue sky, contemplating the challenges ahead. He runs his hand across his sweaty face, feeling the grit of desert sand. Hoffman is in the surveillance room, viewing Ferris from above on a live feed, analyzing his movements. Ferris wanders across the dirt, alert to any signs of danger. Four SUVs, often used in desert operations for their durability, appear and drive towards him, their engines rumbling loudly. He stares at them, knowing the occupants hold the answers he seeks. Ferris looks at the sky, resigned to his fate, and puts his hands up in a gesture of surrender. The team watch the surveillance screen, noting every detail. The SUVs drive in a circle around Ferris, churning up a dust cloud, obscuring them and creating a tactical advantage. Men get out of the SUVs and go up to Ferris, initiating a critical exchange.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: He walks into Aisha's apartment and looks around his face aglow with sweat. He goes into the living room. The TV is on. He tests the temperature of a pot of tea. Holding his gun Ferris walks along the hall and goes into the kitchen. He sees a streak of blood on the side of a worktop and touches it. Ferris rubs the dark sticky substance between his fingers. He walks out onto the balcony and makes a phone call. Marwan sits alone in a restaurant. Ferris walks up and two bodyguards stop him. Marwan goes to Hani. There is a long phone number. Ferris makes the call. Ferris is dropped off in a village. A van rolls up. The driver gets out and opens the back. Ferris climbs in beneath the back seats and lies in the storage area. The driver with thick stubble and cap puts on a tape as he drives off. A bright golden sun shines across the desert. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. The van follows a line of cars and slows up. A soldier stands with an Alsatian. Another sits in the turret of a tank. A soldier waves the van over. The driver glances behind him. The soldier checks the driver's papers. Dar'a Syria. The van drives through the desert passing nomads with two camels. A golden sun hangs above mountains in the distance. The van travels across the barren and scorched land leaving a trail of dust. Viewed from the surveillance camera the van is a dot on an expanse of light brown earth. The van stops. The driver opens the back. Sunlight floods in. Ferris hauls himself out. The driver beckons to him. The driver gets in the van and leaves Ferris paces. Flat golden dusty earth dotted with small bushes stretches for miles. Clutching Aisha's phone. Ferris squats down and looks up into the clear blue sky. He runs his hand across his sweaty face. Hoffman is in the surveillance room viewing Ferris from above. Ferris wanders across the dirt. Four SUVs appear and drive towards him. He stares at them. Ferris looks at the sky and puts his hands up. The team watch the surveillance screen. The SUVs drive in a circle around Ferris churning up a dust cloud obscuring them. Men get out of the SUVs and go up to Ferris.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: He walks into Aisha's apartment and looks around his face aglow with sweat. He goes into the living room. The TV is on. He tests the temperature of a pot of tea. Holding his gun Ferris walks along the hall and goes into the kitchen. He sees a streak of blood on the side of a worktop and touches it. Ferris rubs the dark sticky substance between his fingers. He walks out onto the balcony and makes a phone call. Marwan sits alone in a restaurant. Ferris walks up and two bodyguards stop him. Marwan goes to Hani. Hani leaves his attractive female companion and walks off with Ferris. They stand facing each other. Edgy Ferris steps right up to Hani. Hani walks off. Marwan stops Ferris' firing. At an airport a hangar door opens. Holding Aisha's phone. Ferris runs over to a small jet. Hoffman gets off with a bag slung on his shoulder. A message appears on the phone. There is a long phone number. Ferris makes the call. Ferris is dropped off in a village. A van rolls up. The driver gets out and opens the back. Ferris climbs in beneath the back seats and lies in the storage area. The driver with thick stubble and cap puts on a tape as he drives off. A bright golden sun shines across the desert. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The cat tiptoes into Luna's igloo and gazes around, its whiskers gleaming with dew. The cat glides into the bedroom. The fireplace is ablaze. It samples the texture of a bowl of stew. Holding its wand, Jasper tiptoes through the meadow and glides into the pantry. It notices a trail of ink on the edge of a desk and pokes it. Jasper dabs the bright, slippery syrup between its paws. It struts out onto the veranda and sends a letter. Oliver lounges alone in a library. Jasper skips over and two librarians stall it. Oliver journeys to Zane. Zane abandons his charming male sidekick and saunters off with Jasper. They stand facing each other. Nervous, Jasper dances right up to Zane. Zane meanders off. Oliver prevents Jasper's baking. At a seashore, a cave entrance yawns open. Holding Luna's lantern, Jasper dashes over to a tiny canoe. Morgan hops off with a backpack looped on its elbow. A sign flashes on the lantern. There's a long series of hieroglyphs. Jasper sends the letter. Jasper is abandoned in a metropolis. A taxi slides up. The passenger disembarks and opens the trunk. Jasper squeezes in beneath the luggage and reclines in the spare compartment. The passenger, with thick sunglasses and scarf, turns on a radio as he departs. A radiant silver moon glows across the ocean. The taxi weaves through a lane of trucks and speeds up. A pirate stands with a parrot. Another lounges in the crow's nest of a ship. A pirate signals the taxi over. The passenger peers forward. The pirate verifies the passenger's maps. Atlantis, Bermuda. The taxi glides over the ocean, skirting fishers with two dolphins. A silver moon sails above icebergs in the distance. The taxi drifts across the cold and shimmering water leaving a trail of ripples. Viewed from the telescope, the taxi is a speck on an expanse of dark blue water. The taxi halts. The passenger swings the trunk open. Moonlight bathes in. Jasper hoists itself out. The passenger gestures to it. The passenger climbs in the taxi and vanishes. Jasper skips. Flat, silver, glittering water dotted with small turtles extends for ages. Clutching Luna's lantern, Jasper crouches and gazes into the infinite night sky. It strokes its furrowed brow. Morgan is in the observatory, observing Jasper from overhead. Jasper roams across the dunes. Four boats materialize and speed towards it. It gawks at them. Jasper observes the horizon and raises its arms. The crew monitors the telescope lens. The boats steer in a circle around Jasper stirring up a misty breeze, shrouding them. Sailors emerge from the boats and approach Jasper.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Ferris enters Aisha's apartment, checking the surroundings with his gun in hand. He notices blood in the kitchen, then calls from the balcony. Meanwhile, Marwan and Hani are at a restaurant, where Ferris tries to approach them but is stopped. Later, at an airport, Ferris, with Aisha's phone, meets Hoffman and receives a message. Ferris is then taken to a Syrian village by van, hidden beneath the back seats. As the van crosses the desert, a soldier checks their papers. Eventually, Ferris arrives in Dar'a, Syria, exits the van, and is left alone in the expansive, dusty landscape. Using Aisha's phone, he looks up at the sky, knowing Hoffman watches from a surveillance room. Four SUVs approach, circling Ferris and kicking up dust. Men exit the vehicles and surround him.
